ethuma samaga sewaya kala kalayedi mama atham wita batahira mano widyawa saha budu dahama pilibanda karunu tharka kirimata puruduwa sitiyemi.
ee uthum bududahama pilibanda sarala wu th, sankshiptha wu th, awabodhayak laba ganima sandaha me hi dakwena satahan upayogi kara ganime hakiyawa atha.
mama - na na memane wenne..
me okkoma boruwata dipu eewa.
"oya dannawada,mama oyata aadaraya kale ayi kiyala?"
owun api wethata horen athuluwenawa, apiwa bhayaganwanawa.
hamudawe inna hamoma mata ee nisa aadareyi.
awishkagen gini keliyen ayarlanthayata yana ena man nathi weyi
awurudu 35 thisse lankawe janapriyama yuwala api oyage aadareta oyage sahayogayata sthuthiyi channa mama yashodha wimaladharma

dinen dina wadiwana merata janagahanayata oroththu dena ayurin nawa upaya marga sanwardhana wadasatahan diyath kirimehi purogami wu deshapalanagnyayan athalossakage nam ada janathawa sihipath karanuye...
"hari onna mama welawata aawa, ko ithin oya kiyana kena?"
apa rata muhuden wata wi thibima hethuwen parikshakariwa sitiya yuthu we.
hambanthota minissu palanaya wanne kohomada kiyaya.
nihanda wela balagena innawa.

eewa kisiwakuta wenaskala haki nowe. 2008 warshaye katharagama maha perahara sandaha mayi 20 dina kap situwana ladi.ethan sita dina hathalis pahak ikmayamata pera asala maha perahara sidukala yuthuya.

eeka thamaya, ape hewal ayithikarayo samahara dawaswalata kos gaswala uda indala wala hari waraka hari gedi kadala bimata banna oona wunama eekata ara wathura ganna linde thiyena kambaaya galawala ganna eka!
indiyawen kridikawan 22k ha kridakayan 31k shri lankawata pamina sitina athara, shri lankawen kridikawan 42k ha kridakayan 45k sahabhagi we.
wade harigihin na...
ithin niwunnu wunama karadara kochcharakda kiyala kiyanna ooni nane.
gurukam kiyanne wedi thibba wage kiyalane paranno kiwwe.
oostreliyawe prantha ostreliya mahadwipaya prantha hathakin yuktha thani rajyayaki.
enam nayakayange mantal katha nisa golayanta hondatama nannata siduwiya…
pruthiwiyata abhiyogayak – nawa weni grahaya gana hoduwawak!
chathushtaya kiyana nama danagaththe adayi.

singar kusalana ragbi tharagawaliye dewani sathiye tharaga ada sita shri lanka pasal ragbi sangamaya meheyawana wayasa 19 n pahala singar kusalana lig ragbi tharagawaliye dewani sathiye tharaga ada ( 8 ) aarambha wiya.
mage yatathe inna kata hari kiyanna oone mehema deyak wela thibenawa hoyanna kiyala.
sadakalika tharunyaye ulpatha sewimata balahathkarayen ma jak sparo yoda gani.
ado ara tabuwath hak karapu eke apiwath mattu weyida ?
prawarga: jiwa ෙlakaya, puwath, widya nuwana
sathara pera nimithi dakimen yayi kiya.
me besa thama chamara...

ee athare gathapu kama walin kalak wath iwara wela thibbe na..ala kuru eken bagayak amaruwen kawa wunath...mata mak ban eka nam katewath thiyanna hithune na....ude yaluwo set ekath ekka ja'pure kantimen kapu ayis krim eka arenna dawasatama mokuthma kala hitiye nathath..mata badaginnak ahalakawath thibune na pudumekata wage....
kathawe muladima mata hinagiya..
sihinawalin midena aya wiralaya.
me awasthawe wishala motar rathayak padawagena with eyata tankiya pirena thek petrol purawa tankiya thulata redi thirayak (pahan thirayak wani) athul kara gini thabuwa hoth kumak siduweda?
(ehi di dewana/thewana wara wibhagaya liyu sisunta asadharanaya wuna yayi dan lokuma prashnayak athiwa thibe)
niyapothu pirisiduwata kotata kapala.
eyata ee welawe kol ekak aawa.
idin methanata awuth wichalo nam api ohunta kiyannamo wedayi kiwuya.
yesuswahanseta kala wadha hinsawala wistharakara athi aakarayatama, hisa, pitupasata ha kakul walata samana thuwala athi bawa pene.
samaharawita owun ma amathaka kara damuwa wenna puluwani.
harakta akuru kiyawanna bari nisa oya liyuma wadaka wena ekak naha mata hithenne ..
thisara, tharanga ha malinga wishrama ya yuthuya.
eeth api wadi denage mathayata anuwa katayuthu karanne.

rate rajya aadayama ihala nanwa ganimata badu wadi kirima awashya nam duppatha saha samanya janaya matha badu patawaddi deshapalaka panthiya ee badu mudal walin siyalu sukha wiharana laba ganna saha dhanapathiyangen badu aya no karana kramayakata erehiwa janathawa nagi sitinu atha.
the panaya awasan karala nawathath basaya gaman aarambha kala.

palakayin kunuwalata yata wu hati wasu kiyayi mithotamulla khedawachakaya kunu chawaramkaruwange uwamanawa matha sidu wuwak bawath chawaramkaruwanta yata wima nisa ema anathura siduwu bawath parlimenthu mantha්ri wasudewa nanayakkara mahatha pawasayi.
eeth man umbaata aadareyi kiyala eka parata mawa bada gaththa.
menna podi ayata.
wijewira wagema ohuth wishwasa kale baba hukun karala thaman andunagath deshapalana prashnayata wisandum ganna ba kiyala.
onna ohoma ape ayawa danuwath karanawa nam kawuruth kamathiyi...
ee thanuwata loku balayak thiyenawa.
oya kiyamana kamentu atharin mathu una blog karayo kariyo sahena pramanayak innawa newa..
unusum kalayedi pitatha biththi ikmanin welunada mese pitatha biththi pariwaranaya kala wita biththi welima nisiyakarawa sidu nowe.
hungak ayage alewiyen pasu sewayath honda madi (ni)
sharira aarakshawa sandaha eya bhawitha karanne.
mokada api ehema kiyanna hithuwe aadareta jiwithayak jiwath karawanna, lassana karanna wagema winasha karannath puluwan nisa.
mema wedi thabima mahadhikarana winisuruwaraya ilakka kara ganimin sidu kala wedi thabimak bawata polisiya saka pala karayi.
me kiyana dawase awarithuma mayinathumata katha karala ethumath aaradhithayek nisa ehi yanna yeduna.
puthage palamu pepar ekata lakunu 100 yi.
api mechcharama moda ayi?
oya yasa ageta korala thiyenne..
